ingredients.item: 2½ tbsp fresh lime and chilli dressing

instructions.step: 1. Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. In a roasting tin, toss the chickpeas with the oil, garam masala and some seasoning. Roast for 15 minutes until starting to crisp. Meanwhile, toss the onions in 1 tbsp of the dressing and set aside.
2. Let the chickpeas cool a little, then toss in the dressed onions, mango, spinach leaves and crumbled cheese. Serve drizzled with the remaining dressing.
